message.body: How are you getting to Nyc on Saturday?
I'm actually going on the 3rd Friday. I mixed up the dates. I was planning taking the bus up
Friday is the 2nd. I'll be coming up midday on Saturday on the bus
But I gotta drive up there tomorrow morning to drop off my work
Oh my head is all turned around. Yes the opening is on the 3rd. Great! In in cville right now. I'll be back in town this on Tuesday. If you happened to t
ell Stephen you know me, pet him know I said hello:)
Do you have Stephen romanos cell#? I think he may have given me the galleries # by mistake
No but he's usually around by noon. I know that probably doesn't help much. Sorry. But you could try emailing him. He might respond quickly
